entry.et: Middle English, from Medieval Latin graduale, from Latin gradus step; from its being sung on the steps of the altar

def.dt: :a book containing the choral parts of the Mass
:a pair of verses (as from the Psalms) proper after the Epistle in the Mass

entry.et: Medieval Latin gradualis, from Latin gradus

def.dt: :moving, changing, or developing by fine or often imperceptible degrees
